Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which suggests that it is based on misinterpretation or misinformation, as there is no credible evidence to support the idea that Bill Gates wants to depopulate billions in the world.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence or credible source to support the statement about Bill Gates' desire to depopulate billions.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on unsubstantiated claims made by an individual who was jailed for illegally practicing medicine, which raises doubts about the credibility of the source.
